title: 3 Pack Adjustable Fabric Face Mask Reusable Double Fabric Layers - Made in USAâ€¦ (3 Pack Adjustable)
features: Made in the USA from a durable and washable 100% cotton fabric
These face covers are suitable for men, women, and children, and ideal to wear for extended periods of time.

The face covers are made from a double layer fabric and cover the mouth and nose fully ensuring full coverage. The adjustable elastic ear loops are tied loosely so you can tighten and adjust them yourself.

Washable and reusable, these covers have good resilience and stretchability, and can easily be folded inside pockets when not in use. The length is 8" and it stretches to fit your face, the nose to chin measurement is 5.75".

title: Adjustable Fabric Face Masks with Neck String
